newsitem.title: RUSSIA: PRESS DIGEST - RUSSIA IZVESTIA - MAY 23.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - RUSSIA IZVESTIA - MAY 23.

text.p: Following are some of the leading stories in the May 24 edition of Russia's Izvestia newspaper. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Tax Service Chief Alexander Pochinok plans to work harder on revealing tax evasion by individuals and on improving the mechanism of collecting taxes from big state budget debtors
- The creation of a united state between Russia and Belarus is postponed for some time under the Charter signed by the leaders of both Slav republics on Friday
- Russia's Central Bank has signed an agreement with the National Bank of Chechnya on recognising the Russian rouble as the only legal currency on the republic's territory
- The appointment of the commander of Strategic Rocket Forces as Russia's Defence Minister is expected to lead to the creation of a force for space missile defence
